mainsSection.title:
Automated
Crypto Investing Powered by AI
mainsSection.description: Leverage our artificial intelligence strategies to stop speculating and increase your returns* Professional investors can create and test strategies using our tool kits and exchange integrations.

whatWeDo.title: What we do
whatWeDo.description: We built Bedrock to support our own advanced trading needs. The team is composed of researchers, fin-tech professionals, and smart contract engineers.

blocks.title: Deposit funds into a supported exchange.
blocks.description: Connect your exchange(s) and select which AI strategy you would like to deploy. Monitor performance and adjust as the markets evolve.

blocks.title: Employ an AI strategy to grow your account.
blocks.description: Take advantage of our tested solutions to grow your account or employ different strategies regardless of a bull, or bear market.

blocks.title: Monitor Performance
blocks.description: Track, pause or change your strategies based on market performance.

exchangesBlock.title: Connect your exchanges & enable automated trading
exchangesBlock.description: Trade in any climate, bull, bear or sideways markets.

whatIsBedrock.title: AN Automated investment platform
whatIsBedrock.subTitle: What is Bedrock
whatIsBedrock.description: Our AI-driven platform analyzes the complexities of cryptocurrency trading, delivering actionable insights and strategies directly to you.r trading account.  We make data informed trades, day or night, scanning markets for opportunities.

footer.description: Make your complicated Assets more simple and advanced.

mainsSection.title: AI Powered Investing for your fund or RIA
mainsSection.description: Enhance your portfolio with meticulously trained strategies, offering diversified and uncorrelated returns. A dedicated offering for money managers, funds family offices and advisors.

options.description:
increased ROI compared to
buy and hold

blocks.title: AI-Driven Investing Simplified.
blocks.description: Connect your exchange(s) and select which AI strategy you would like to deploy. Dedicate an investment amount and let automated strategies manage the trades.

blocks.title: Build & Test Strategies
blocks.description: Design trading bots based on our easy to use interface and analyze performance using our built-in back testing tools. Leverage stop losses and other tools to manage risk.

slider.title: Strategies for every market.
slider.description: Our latest strategy is trained on bull, bear and sideways markets enabling you to navigate whatever the market may bring.

slider.title: Trend Following or Scalping
slider.description: Follow the trend of a  bull market or quickly scalp profits without human intervention

slider.title: Protection at every turn
slider.description: Stop losses, trailing stops and limit orders aid in controlling account volatility.

smallBlocks.text: Manage trades across exchanges from one centralized platform

exchangesBlock.title: Connect your exchanges & enable automated trading
exchangesBlock.description: Many companies have tried using Bedrock and they trust the safety of their assets.
